subject: Basketball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Knicks, the N.B.A.’s oldest team, use more than 35 pounds of ice after some games, but Pablo Prigioni, a 35-year-old rookie from Argentina, does not partake.
snippet: The Knicks, the N.B.A.’s oldest team, use more than 35 pounds of ice after some games, but Pablo Prigioni, a 35-year-old rookie from Argentina, does not partake.
